results.firPara: The striker is prolific and has an admirable work ethic but, as in the match at Parc des Princes, has a habit of falling short when his team need him the most
results.secPara: The two things that nearly everyone agrees on are he is dashingly swoonsome and that is irrelevant. Beyond that there is constant debate about the usefulness of a high-scoring striker who will attempt to deliver a decisive performance at the Emirates on Wednesday. We are talking – before anyone launches into another dissertation on Olivier Giroud – about Edinson Cavani.
results.webTitle: Edinson Cavani must shed big-game jitters if PSG are to leapfrog Arsenal

results.firPara: The Montreal Impact edged ahead of their Canadian rivals Toronto FC in the MLS Eastern Conference final on Tuesday night – but they had to wait for their victory.
results.secPara: The match was delayed 30 minutes after it was discovered that the penalty areas were two yards short of regulation size. That meant the lines had to be repainted.
results.webTitle: MLS playoffs: Montreal beat Toronto after wrong lines painted on pitch

results.firPara: • Leicester manager says winning Champions League group unbelievable
results.secPara: • Leicester manager says winning Champions League group unbelievable
results.webTitle: Claudio Ranieri delighted but desperate to focus on Premier League problems

results.firPara: • Tottenham manager admits Champions League was a step too far
results.secPara: Mauricio Pochettino made the candid admission that his Tottenham Hotspur squad had found the group phase of the Champions League to be a step too far, as he suggested that changes on all levels, including personnel, would be needed to move them forward.
results.webTitle: Mauricio Pochettino says changes needed after Spurs flop in Monaco

results.firPara: The former Tottenham, Manchester City and Liverpool player Paul Stewart has revealed he turned to drink and drugs during his career after suffering sexual abuse by a youth coach.
results.secPara: Stewart, who played three times for England, claimed he was assaulted on a daily basis for four years by a coach who had told him he would make him a star.
results.webTitle: Paul Stewart: I was sexually abused by my football coach for four years

results.firPara: Razzmatazz was in short supply, but after the turbulence of two debilitating defeats, the atmosphere at Bruce Arenas first press conference felt about right
results.secPara: Razzmatazz was in short supply, but after the turbulence of two debilitating defeats, the atmosphere at Bruce Arenas first press conference felt about right
results.webTitle: Bruce Arena unveiled to little fanfare but USA hope second time's a charm

results.firPara: Charlton, seeking an eighth manager since March 2014, cruised to a 5-1 win at Bristol Rovers to climb into the top half of the League One table. Kevin Nugent was put in caretaker charge following the sacking of Russell Slade and has won both of his games.
results.secPara: Nugents team, who had beaten Port Vale 2-0 on Saturday, were ahead after 26 minutes on Tuesday through Ademola Lookman, with Josh Magennis doubling the lead just before half-time.
results.webTitle: Charlton hit five at Bristol Rovers to make it two out of two for Nugent

results.firPara: • Leicester midfielder faces three-match ban for incident at Watford
results.secPara: Danny Drinkwater has been charged with violent conduct by the Football Association after appearing to elbow Watfords Valon Behrami, leaving the Leicester City midfielder facing the prospect of a three-match suspension.
results.webTitle: Danny Drinkwater charged by FA over elbow on Valon Behrami
